attributes.action: Boycott Euro 2013 on Human rights grounds
attributes.additional_details:
The U21 Euro 2013 Championship is going to be in Isreal. There are two issues with this first of all Isreal isn't in Europe but secondly and most importantly are the human rights issues.
 The footballer Mahmoud Al-Sarsak is just one example of the human rights abuses who only recently ended his hunger strike in exchange for early release.

The UK Government should boycott Euro 2013, for the thousands that have been killed and by the Israeli Government.
